Trade/Device Name(s): Medisign MM3000 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign MM3000 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Submitter Information: Tianjin Empecs Medical Device Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Medisign MM3000 Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Medisign MM3000 and MM3000 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems using glucose oxidase technology for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm; single-user self-testing at home and multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings; aids in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
